title: Expert: Large foreign investments may change Armenia from within
content:
YEREVAN. – Large foreign investments can change Armenia from inside. 
 
Partner, Head of Management Advisory Services at Ameria Group of Companies, Tigran Jrbashyan, stated the abovementioned at Wednesday’s press conference at the Government Building. 
 
The press conference was devoted to the Armenia Investment Conference, which will be convened in September 2016 in New York City, USA. 
 
“There are investment opportunities also where there are no natural resources,” noted Jrbashyan. “Forming a stable legal framework is very important. 
 
“We have formed such a thing in renewable energy, [and] there is a good background for the development of industrial agriculture. 
 
“Foreign investments will be very important [to Armenia], first of all, for the fact that they will bring a new business culture [to the country].” 
  Armenia News - NEWS.am
